Class ImageBusiness

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.business.image.ImageBusiness
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleImage, WritableImage
public class ImageBusiness extends Object implements WritableImage
Represents an image with pixel data, file path, and format information. Implements WritableImage to provide methods for retrieving data, persisting, and exporting images.

  • Method Details

    • read

      public static WritableImage read(String path) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Reads an image from the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the image file to read
      Returns:
      a WritableImage representing the image
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file
      IllegalAccessException - if there is an issue accessing the data access component

    • persist

      public void persist(String path) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Persists the current image to the file system at the specified path.
      Specified by:
      persist in interface WritableImage
      Parameters:
      path - the path where the image should be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing the file
      IllegalAccessException - if there is an issue accessing the data access component

    • export

      public void export(String extension, String path) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Exports the current image to a different format and saves it at the specified path.
      Specified by:
      export in interface WritableImage
      Parameters:
      extension - the desired file extension for the exported image
      path - the path where the exported image should be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing the file
      IllegalAccessException - if there is an issue accessing the data access component

    • getPixels

      public long[][] getPixels()
      Gets the pixel data of the image as a 2D array of ARGB values. Each pixel is represented as a long value in ARGB format.
      Specified by:
      getPixels in interface SimpleImage
      Returns:
      a 2D array containing the image's pixel data
